title: Looking for ADC main to join our ranked team (ANY RANK)
body:
Hey guys,
The XxxNew World OrderxxX has had recent roster changes over the last few days and we are currently looking for a dedicated ADC sub for our semi-serious ranked team. We are accepting players of all ranks, add me IGN: Pandadude123

replies.body: I too would be interested in playing the adc role. Can play many champs and would like to play some games with the support first so that we can synergise better in game.
I am willing to ADC for yo but only if there is a support who doesnt just ditch if i get caught (not that that would happen), Friend Request sent :Erubus
